audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_7::g: Has anything been done about the issue? Record the change.
audiotemplate_highlights::text_card_0::t: This template will help you capture the best moments in your story. Highlights stories are structured less to illustrate a clear story line and more to show the peak moments or most dramatic aspects of the topic. In audio, highlights stories are typically bracketed by the storyteller's voice.
audiotemplate_highlights::title: Highlights Audio
audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_0::g: Record sound of the community that your story is about.
audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_3::g: Record the most important element of the story.
audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_7::g: If nothing has changed, explain that.
audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_1::g: Introduce the main character(s) in your story.
audiotemplate_highlights::text_card_1::t: You may want more clips. On each clip there is a button that looks like three vertical dots. This is the \“overflow menu.\” This button will allow you to edit your clips or duplicate the card.
audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_4::g: Record another example that illustrates the story.
audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_5::g: Record another important element of the story.
audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_6::g: Record the effect of the issue. Show how it impacts the community.
audiotemplate_highlights::clip_card_2::g: Record audio that sums up the the story and its importance.
